column4: can i ask some advice: Ubuntu is the only distro i've used, and the community is very helpful and friendly to new users.  a prospective job/project i may be involved with uses centos and i've considered switching.  How much different will centos be?  I know I wll have to use yum instead of apt, how different is yum?  Also, will centos have such a newbie friendly community to help me?
ive not used a RPM based disrto in years..
the thing to learn about linux - is if you learn the fundamentals, those rarely change from disrto to disrto.
